segments.text: I need something to eat , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me what you're hungry for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel like champagne , lobster tail , and filet mignon , medium rare .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , we're out of filet mignon at the moment . May I suggest the porterhouse instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I prefer filet , but porterhouse is good , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps I could interest you in chocolate-covered strawberries with the champagne ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just the champagne will be fine , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll see this charge on your amenities account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It won't be long until your food is delivered . I know you'll enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S2
